altera-kernel-name-restriction.description:
Description

Finds kernel files and include directives whose filename is
kernel.cl
,
Verilog.cl
, or
VHDL.cl
. The check is case insensitive.

Such kernel file names cause the offline compiler to generate intermediate
design files that have the same names as certain internal files, which
leads to a compilation error.

Based on the
Guidelines for Naming the Kernel
section in the
Intel FPGA SDK for OpenCL Pro Edition: Programming Guide
.
altera-kernel-name-restriction.option:
Static analysis (Clang-Tidy) options are configured via .clang-tidy file.

This rule has no specific options.
